title: 通过 Cmder 启动服务器时报错
author: Alorw
txt_content:
通过  Cmder运行.bat文件  启动服务器后会出现一段报错，如下所示

[17:53:25] [Server console handler/WARN]: Exception in thread "Server console handler" com.sun.jna.LastErrorException: [127] 找不到指定的程序。
[17:53:25] [Server console handler/WARN]:         at com.sun.jna.Native.invokeVoid(Native Method)
[17:53:25] [Server console handler/WARN]:         at com.sun.jna.Function.invoke(Function.java:408)
[17:53:25] [Server console handler/WARN]:         at com.sun.jna.Function.invoke(Function.java:354)
[17:53:25] [Server console handler/WARN]:         at com.sun.jna.Library$Handler.invoke(Library.java:244)
[17:53:25] [Server console handler/WARN]:         at org.jline.terminal.impl.jna.win.$Proxy19.SetConsoleMode(Unknown Source)
[17:53:25] [Server console handler/WARN]:         at org.jline.terminal.impl.jna.win.JnaWinSysTerminal.setConsoleMode(JnaWinSysTerminal.java:55)
[17:53:25] [Server console handler/WARN]:         at org.jline.terminal.impl.AbstractWindowsTerminal.updateConsoleMode(AbstractWindowsTerminal.java:193)
[17:53:25] [Server console handler/WARN]:         at org.jline.terminal.impl.AbstractWindowsTerminal.setAttributes(AbstractWindowsTerminal.java:179)
[17:53:25] [Server console handler/WARN]:         at org.jline.terminal.impl.AbstractTerminal.enterRawMode(AbstractTerminal.java:100)
[17:53:25] [Server console handler/WARN]:         at org.jline.reader.impl.LineReaderImpl.readLine(LineReaderImpl.java:481)
[17:53:25] [Server console handler/WARN]:         at org.jline.reader.impl.LineReaderImpl.readLine(LineReaderImpl.java:390)
[17:53:25] [Server console handler/WARN]:         at com.destroystokyo.paper.console.TerminalHandler.handleCommands(TerminalHandler.java:36)
[17:53:25] [Server console handler/WARN]:         at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.DedicatedServer$2.run(DedicatedServer.java:77)
[17:53:25] [Server thread/INFO]: This server is running Paper version git-Paper-1270 (MC: 1.12.2) (Implementing API version 1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT)复制代码

直接双击批处理文件不会出现此情况

replies.txt_content:
Cmder不能这样的吧= =
你得手动复制类似这样的一行
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_144\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512M -Xms512M -XX:PermSize=128m -jar PaperSpigot-1.8.8.jar复制代码4
然后粘贴进Cmder里面运行

replies.author: Alorw
replies.txt_content:
1850343382 发表于 2017-12-15 17:59
Cmder不能这样的吧= =
你得手动复制类似这样的一行
